Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_file_error

The function AIL_file_error returns the last file I/O error from AIL_file_read, AIL_file_write, or AIL_file_size.

S32 AIL_file_error();

Returns

One of the MILES_FILE_ERRORS constants.


Group: Memory and File Services
Related Functions: AIL_WAV_file_write, AIL_file_fss_read, AIL_file_read, AIL_file_size, AIL_file_write
Related Basic Types: MILES_FILE_ERRORS, S32
